mapper.update: update customer set cus_name = #{cusName}, cus_depw = #{cusDepw}, cus_add = #{cusAdd}, cus_add2 = #{cusAdd2}, cus_postcode = #{cusPostcode}, cus_gender = #{cusGender}, cus_tel = #{cusTel}, cus_email = #{cusEmail}, cus_birth = #{cusBirth} where cus_id = #{cusId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( qna_no ) FROM qna q, customer c WHERE q.qna_delyn = 'N' and q.cus_no = c.cus_no and c.cus_no = (select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId})

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(rr_no) FROM RG_RESERVATION where rr_status = 'Y' and cus_no=( select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId})) rrrCount, (SELECT COUNT(mrr_no) FROM MR_RESERVATION where mrr_status = 'Y' and cus_no=( select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId})) mrCount, (SELECT COUNT(hr_no) FROM HT_RESERVATION where hr_status = 'Y' and cus_no=( select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId})) hrCount, (SELECT COUNT(tk_no) FROM TICKETING where tk_del = 'N' and cus_no=( select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId})) trCount, (SELECT COUNT(pr_no) FROM PARKING_REC where pr_status = 'Y' and cus_no=( select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId})) prCount FROM DUAL

select p.pr_no, p.pl_no, p.pr_carno, p.pr_entry, p.pr_exit, p.pr_cost, p.pr_name, p.pr_tel, p.cus_no, p.pr_date from parking_rec p, customer c where p.pr_status = 'Y' and p.cus_no = c.cus_no and c.cus_no = ( select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId})

select h.hr_no, h.ht_no, h.hr_name, h.hr_tel, h.hr_checkin, h.hr_date, h.hr_cost from customer c, ht_reservation h where h.hr_status = 'Y' and h.cus_no = c.cus_no and h.cus_no = ( select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId})

select r.rr_no, r.rg_no, r.rr_name, r.rr_tel, r.rr_count, r.rr_cost, r.rr_date from customer c, rg_reservation r where r.rr_status = 'Y' and r.cus_no = c.cus_no and r.cus_no = ( select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId})

SELECT t.tk_group, t.tk_no, t.cus_no, t.tk_flight, t.tk_seat, t.tk_depart, ic_depart.ic_kr AS tk_departcity, t.tk_departdate, t.tk_arrival, ic_arrival.ic_kr AS tk_arrivalcity, t.tk_arridate, t.tk_passport, t.tk_price, t.tk_engfirst, t.tk_lastname, t.tk_weight, t.tk_tel, t.tk_email, t.tk_birth, t.tk_gender, t.tk_group, pl.sc_gate, pl.sc_checkin FROM customer c, ticketing t, iata_code ic_depart, iata_code ic_arrival, plane_schedule pl WHERE t.cus_no = c.cus_no AND t.tk_del = 'N' AND ic_depart.ic_code = t.tk_depart AND ic_arrival.ic_code = t.tk_arrival AND c.cus_no = ( select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId}) AND pl.sc_no = t.tk_flight order by t.tk_date desc
select ic_kr from iata_code i, ticketing t where i.ic_code = t.tk_depart and t.tk_no = #{tkNo} and t.cus_no = #( select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId})
select ic_kr from iata_code i, ticketing t where i.ic_code = t.tk_arrival and t.tk_no = #{tkNo} and t.cus_no = #( select cus_no from customer where cus_id = #{cusId})
mapper.update: update parking_rec set pr_status = 'N' where pr_no = #{prNo}
update ht_reservation set hr_status = 'N' where hr_no = #{hrNo}
update rg_reservation set rr_status = 'N' where rr_no = #{rrNo}
update ticketing set tk_del = 'Y' where tk_no = #{tkNo}
